direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods process and retrieve values associated with options, but getParsedOptionValue converts the value to a specific type.
Both methods access and process option-related data, but getOptionProperties processes the data into properties.
Both methods retrieve values associated with options, but getOptionValues returns an array of values.
Both methods retrieve an object related to an option, but getOptionObject handles exceptions differently.
Both methods parse and return a value of a specific type, differing only in the type of the input parameter.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require URL parser initialization.
Environment setup is required before validating URLs.
Both methods verify URL formats and handle similar exceptions.
